title: Capacity factor of nuclear power plants in the U.S. 1975 to 2018
summary: The Capacity of the men 's lifestyle and entertainment magazine U.S. has decreased significantly in recent years , dropping to just over 200 thousand in 2018 from 91.7 % 77.4 years earlier .
The magazine reported its highest factor Capacity in 1990 , when an average issue sold 92.6 million copies .
U.S. Capacity numbers – additional information Founded in 1953 by the late Hugh Hefner , U.S. is a men 's lifestyle and entertainment magazine .
gold: This statistic represents the capacity factor of nuclear power plants in the United States between 1975 and 2018 . In 2018 , the capacity factor of U.S. nuclear power plants stood at around 92.6 percent .
